Event.name: Attempt_obtain_food_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Seeker</fen> is trying to obtain <fen>Food</fen> and is seeking it within the context of a <fen>Ground</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Seeker
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Seeker</fen> is the agent hoping to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Food
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Food</fen> is the sought-out item by the <fen>Seeker</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Instrument</fen> is used by the <fen>Seeker</fen> as a tool to help obtain <fen>Food</fen>. (This tool is not limited to typical artifacts and can be hands, arms, and other atypical hunting and fishing instruments.) </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>For what length of time the <fen>Seeker</fen> attempted to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Seeker</fen> makes the attempt for <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which an attempt at achieving a <fen>Food</fen> obtainment.</def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The failure or success of an attempt. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The greater geographic location where the <fen>Seeker</fen> attempts to obtain <fen>Food</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Seeker</fen> intends to accomplish by seeking <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the amount of effort the <fen>Seeker</fen> puts into an attempt to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Ground
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the entity to which the <fen>Seeker</fen> pays attention. It is referred to as <fen>Ground</fen> because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: subsistence.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the means by which a person or society obtains basic food necessities.
